entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:04 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.0°C

Visibility: 48.3 km

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 early in the afternoon except gusting to 80 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
